definitions.definition: Armed resistance to an established government or ruler .
examples: The government is doing its best to stop rebellion in the country.

definitions.definition: Defiance of authority or control ; the act of rebelling .
examples: Having a tattoo was Mathilda's personal rebellion against her parents.

definitions.definition: An organized, forceful subversion of the law of the land in an attempt to replace it with another form of government.
examples: The army general led a successful rebellion and became president of the country.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Armed resistance to an established government or ruler .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Defiance of authority or control ; the act of rebelling .
( countable ) An organized, forceful subversion of the law of the land in an attempt to replace it with another form of government.
